name: [Student Project] DOOM-based Level Design Sample
description:
A blockout sample for Level Design classes made with DOOM (2016) in mind.

A single-level project developed over the 2022 winter term by a third-year SPRINT-WRITE student at the University of Silesia.

Built with UE4.

Asset Packs:
* Advanced Locomotion System V4 (Longmire Locomotion)
* Polar Sci-Fi Facility (Julio Juarez)
